game.name: You Belong Here
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, 음량 개별 조정, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Family man Philip Oakes wakes up with a piercing headache, unable to remember his past. Dazed, he explores an old home, receiving guidance from a caller on the phone. As Philip walks through the familiar rooms, he uncovers a reality better left forgotten.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Family man Philip Oakes wakes up with a piercing headache, unable to remember his past. Dazed, he explores an old home, receiving guidance from a caller on the phone. As Philip walks through the familiar rooms, he uncovers a reality better left forgotten.
